mods.railcraft.api.tracks

Interface ITrackPowered

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INetworkedObject, ITrackInstance

    public interface ITrackPowered
extends ITrackInstance
    Implementing this interface will allow your track to be powered via Redstone. And so long as you inherit from TrackInstanceBase, all the code for updating the power state is already in place (including propagation).
    Author:
    CovertJaguar

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPowerPropagation()
      The distance that a redstone signal will be passed along from track to track.
